name: Bloom Studio
biography: Bloom, San Francisco (2011-2012) was a creative design studio whose goal was to promote new types of visual discovery experiences – or “visual instruments” – to help users explore and navigate and understand their lives as experienced through online and social services. Bloom was founded in 2011 by three principals: Ben Cerveny, Tom Carden and Jesper Anderson. Robert Hodgin joined later that year as Creative Director.
